constellations.name: Excellent Blood
constellations.effect: The CRIT Rate of Kaeya's Normal and Charge Attacks against opponents affected by <color=#99FFFFFF>Cryo</color> is increased by 15%.

constellations.name: Never-Ending Performance
constellations.effect: Every time <color=#FFD780FF>Glacial Waltz</color> defeats an opponent during its duration, its duration is increased by 2.5s, up to a maximum of 15s.

constellations.name: Dance of Frost
constellations.effect: Increases the Level of <color=#FFD780FF>Frostgnaw</color> by 3.\nMaximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Frozen Kiss
constellations.effect:
Triggers automatically when Kaeya's HP falls below 20%:
Creates a shield that absorbs damage equal to 30% of Kaeya's Max HP. Lasts for 20s.
This shield absorbs <color=#99FFFFFF>Cryo DMG</color> with 250% efficiency.
Can only occur once every 60s.

constellations.name: Frostbiting Embrace
constellations.effect: Increases the Level of <color=#FFD780FF>Glacial Waltz</color> by 3.\nMaximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Glacial Whirlwind
constellations.effect: <color=#FFD780FF>Glacial Waltz</color> will generate 1 additional icicle, and will regenerate 15 Energy when cast.

constellations.name: One Arrow to Rule Them All
constellations.effect: Fires 2 arrows per <color=#FFD780FF>Aimed Shot</color>. The second arrow deals 20% of the first arrow's DMG.

constellations.name: Bunny Triggered
constellations.effect: Baron Bunny, new and improved! Hitting Baron Bunny's foot with a fully-charged Aimed Shot manually detonates it.\nExplosion via manual detonation deals 200% additional DMG.

constellations.name: It Burns!
constellations.effect: Increases the Level of <color=#FFD780FF>Fiery Rain</color> by 3.\nMaximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: It's Not Just Any Doll...
constellations.effect: Decreases <color=#FFD780FF>Explosive Puppet</color>'s CD by 20%. Adds 1 additional charge.

constellations.name: It's Baron Bunny!
constellations.effect: Increases the Level of <color=#FFD780FF>Explosive Puppet</color> by 3.\nMaximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Wildfire
constellations.effect: <color=#FFD780FF>Fiery Rain</color> increases all party members' Movement SPD by 15% and ATK by 15% for 10s.

constellations.name: Crispy Outside, Tender Inside
constellations.effect: Opponents hit by Guoba's attacks have their <color=#FF9999FF>Pyro RES</color> reduced by 15% for 6s.

constellations.name: Oil Meets Fire
constellations.effect: The last attack in a Normal Attack sequence applies the Implode status onto the opponent for 2s. An explosion will occur once this duration ends, dealing 75% of Xiangling's ATK as <color=#FF9999FF>AoE Pyro DMG</color>.

constellations.name: Deepfry
constellations.effect: Increases the Level of <color=#FFD780FF>Pyronado</color> by 3.\nMaximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Slowbake
constellations.effect: <color=#FFD780FF>Pyronado</color>'s duration is increased by 40%.

constellations.name: Guoba Mad
constellations.effect: Increases the Level of <color=#FFD780FF>Guoba Attack</color> by 3.\nMaximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Condensed Pyronado
constellations.effect: For the duration of <color=#FFD780FF>Pyronado</color>, all party members receive a 15% <color=#FF9999FF>Pyro DMG Bonus</color>.

constellations.name: Dew-Drinker
constellations.effect: Taking DMG from a Charge Level 2 Frostflake Arrow or Frostflake Arrow Bloom decreases opponents' <color=#99FFFFFF>Cryo RES</color> by 15% for 6s.\nA hit regenerates 2 Energy for Ganyu. This effect can only occur once per Charge Level 2 Frostflake Arrow, regardless if Frostflake Arrow itself or its Bloom hit the target.

constellations.name: The Auspicious
constellations.effect: <color=#FFD780FF>Trail of the Qilin</color> gains 1 additional charge.

constellations.name: Cloud-Strider
constellations.effect: Increases the Level of <color=#FFD780FF>Celestial Shower</color> by 3.\nMaximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Westward Sojourn
constellations.effect: Opponents standing within the AoE of <color=#FFD780FF>Celestial Shower</color> take increased DMG. This effect strengthens over time.\nIncreased DMG taken begins at 5% and increases by 5% every 3s, up to a maximum of 25%.\nThe effect lingers for 3s after the opponent leaves the AoE.

constellations.name: The Merciful
constellations.effect: Increases the Level of <color=#FFD780FF>Trail of the Qilin</color> by 3.\nMaximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: The Clement
constellations.effect: Using <color=#FFD780FF>Trail of the Qilin</color> causes the next Frostflake Arrow shot within 30s to not require charging.

constellations.name: The Scent Remained
constellations.effect: Increases the maximum number of Rain Swords by 1.

constellations.name: Rainbow Upon the Azure Sky
constellations.effect: Extends the duration of <color=#FFD780FF>Guhua Sword: Raincutter</color> by 3s.\nDecreases the <color=#80C0FFFF>Hydro RES</color> of opponents hit by sword rain attacks by 15% for 4s.

constellations.name: Weaver of Verses
constellations.effect: Increases the Level of <color=#FFD780FF>Guhua Sword: Raincutter</color> by 3.\nMaximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Evilsoother
constellations.effect: Throughout the duration of <color=#FFD780FF>Guhua Sword: Raincutter</color>, the DMG dealt by <color=#FFD780FF>Guhua Sword: Fatal Rainscreen</color> is increased by 50%.

constellations.name: Embrace of Rain
constellations.effect: Increases the Level of <color=#FFD780FF>Guhua Sword: Fatal Rainscreen</color> by 3.\nMaximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Hence, Call Them My Own Verses
constellations.effect: Activating 2 of <color=#FFD780FF>Guhua Sword: Raincutter</color>'s sword rain attacks greatly increases the DMG of the third. Xingqiu regenerates 3 Energy when sword rain attacks hit opponents.

constellations.name: I Got Your Back
constellations.effect: While <color=#FFD780FF>Sweeping Time</color> and <color=#FFD780FF>Breastplate</color> are both in effect, the chance of Breastplate's healing effects activating is increased to 100%.

constellations.name: Combat Maid
constellations.effect: Decreases the Stamina Consumption of Noelle's Charged Attacks by 20% and increases her Charged Attack DMG by 15%.

constellations.name: Invulnerable Maid
constellations.effect: Increases the Level of <color=#FFD780FF>Breastplate</color> by 3.\nMaximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: To Be Cleaned
constellations.effect: When <color=#FFD780FF>Breastplate</color>'s duration expires or it is destroyed by DMG, it will deal 400% ATK of <color=#FFE699FF>Geo DMG</color> to surrounding opponents.

constellations.name: Favonius Sweeper Master
constellations.effect: Increases the Level of <color=#FFD780FF>Sweeping Time</color> by 3.\nMaximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Must Be Spotless
constellations.effect: <color=#FFD780FF>Sweeping Time</color> increases Noelle's ATK by an additional 50% of her DEF.\nAdditionally, every opponent defeated during the skill's duration adds 1s to the duration, up to 10s.

constellations.name: Infinite Circuit
constellations.effect: Lisa regenerates 2 Energy for every opponent hit while holding <color=#FFD780FF>Violet Arc</color>.\nA maximum of 10 Energy can be regenerated in this manner at any one time.

constellations.name: Electromagnetic Field
constellations.effect: Holding <color=#FFD780FF>Violet Arc</color> has the following effects:\n·Increases DEF by 25%.\n·Increases Lisa's resistance to interruption.

constellations.name: Resonant Thunder
constellations.effect: Increases the Level of <color=#FFD780FF>Lightning Rose</color> by 3.\nMaximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Plasma Eruption
constellations.effect: Increases the number of lightning bolts released by <color=#FFD780FF>Lightning Rose</color> by 1-3.

constellations.name: Electrocute
constellations.effect: Increases the Level of <color=#FFD780FF>Violet Arc</color> by 3.\nMaximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Pulsating Witch
constellations.effect: When Lisa takes the field, she applies 3 stacks of <color=#FFD780FF>Violet Arc</color>'s Conductive status onto nearby opponents.\nThis effect can only occur once every 5s.

constellations.name: Spiraling Tempest
constellations.effect: Increases the pulling speed of <color=#FFD780FF>Gale Blade</color> after holding for more than 1s, and increases the DMG dealt by 40%.

constellations.name: People's Aegis
constellations.effect: When Jean picks up an Elemental Orb/Particle, all party members have their Movement SPD and ATK SPD increased by 15% for 15s.

constellations.name: When the West Wind Arises
constellations.effect: Increases the Level of <color=#FFD780FF>Dandelion Breeze</color> by 3.\nMaximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Lands of Dandelion
constellations.effect: Within the Field created by <color=#FFD780FF>Dandelion Breeze</color>, all opponents have their <color=#80FFD7FF>Anemo RES</color> decreased by 40%.

constellations.name: Outbursting Gust
constellations.effect: Increases the Level of <color=#FFD780FF>Gale Blade</color> by 3.\nMaximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Lion's Fang, Fair Protector of Mondstadt
constellations.effect: Incoming DMG is decreased by 35% within the Field created by <color=#FFD780FF>Dandelion Breeze</color>. Upon leaving the Dandelion Field, this effect lasts for 3 attacks or 10s.

constellations.name: Gleeful Songs
constellations.effect: Barbara regenerates 1 Energy every 10s.

constellations.name: Vitality Burst
constellations.effect: Decreases the CD of <color=#FFD780FF>Let the Show Begin♪</color> by 15%.\nDuring the ability's duration, your active character gains a 15% <color=#80C0FFFF>Hydro DMG Bonus</color>.

constellations.name: Star of Tomorrow
constellations.effect: Increases the Level of <color=#FFD780FF>Shining Miracle♪</color> by 3.\nMaximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Attentiveness be My Power
constellations.effect: Every opponent Barbara hits with her Charged Attack regenerates 1 Energy for her.\nA maximum of 5 energy can be regenerated in this manner with any one Charged Attack.

constellations.name: The Purest Companionship
constellations.effect: Increases the Level of <color=#FFD780FF>Let the Show Begin♪</color> by 3.\nMaximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Dedicating Everything to You
constellations.effect:
When Barbara is in the party but not on the field, and one of your own party members falls:
·Automatically revives the fallen character.
·Fully restores the revived character's HP to 100%.
This effect can only occur once every 15 mins.

constellations.name: Grand Expectation
constellations.effect: <color=#FFD780FF>Fantastic Voyage</color>'s ATK increase no longer has an HP restriction, and gains an additional 20% of Bennett's Base ATK.

constellations.name: Impasse Conqueror
constellations.effect: When Bennett's HP falls below 70%, his Energy Recharge is increased by 30%.

constellations.name: Unstoppable Fervor
constellations.effect: Increases the Level of <color=#FFD780FF>Passion Overload</color> by 3.\nMaximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Unexpected Odyssey
constellations.effect: Using a Normal Attack when executing the second attack of <color=#FFD780FF>Passion Overload</color>'s Charge Level 1 allows an additional attack to be performed.\nThis additional attack does 135% of the second attack's DMG.

constellations.name: True Explorer
constellations.effect: Increases the Level of <color=#FFD780FF>Fantastic Voyage</color> by 3.\nMaximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Fire Ventures with Me
constellations.effect: Sword, Claymore, or Polearm-wielding characters inside <color=#FFD780FF>Fantastic Voyage</color>'s radius gain a 15% <color=#FF9999FF>Pyro DMG Bonus</color> and their weapons are infused with <color=#FF9999FF>Pyro</color>.

constellations.name: Ice Unleashed
constellations.effect: The last attack of Chongyun's Normal Attack combo releases 3 ice blades. Each blade deals 50% of Chongyun's ATK as <color=#99FFFFFF>Cryo DMG</color> to all opponents in its path.

constellations.name: Atmospheric Revolution
constellations.effect: Elemental Skills and Elemental Bursts cast within the Frost Field created by <color=#FFD780FF>Spirit Blade: Chonghua's Layered Frost</color> have their CD time decreased by 15%.

constellations.name: Cloudburst
constellations.effect: Increases the Level of <color=#FFD780FF>Spirit Blade: Cloud-parting Star</color> by 3.\nMaximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Frozen Skies
constellations.effect: Chongyun regenerates 1 Energy every time he hits an opponent affected by <color=#99FFFFFF>Cryo</color>.\nThis effect can only occur once every 2s.

constellations.name: The True Path
constellations.effect: Increases the Level of <color=#FFD780FF>Spirit Blade: Chonghua's Layered Frost</color> by 3.\nMaximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Rally of Four Blades
constellations.effect: <color=#FFD780FF>Spirit Blade: Cloud-parting Star</color> deals 15% more DMG to opponents with a lower percentage of their Max HP remaining than Chongyun.\nThis skill will also summon 1 additional spirit blade.

constellations.name: Wolf's Instinct
constellations.effect: Picking up an Elemental Orb or Particle increases Razor's DMG by 10% for 8s.

constellations.name: Suppression
constellations.effect: Increases CRIT Rate against opponents with less than 30% HP by 10%.

constellations.name: Soul Companion
constellations.effect: Increases the Level of <color=#FFD780FF>Lightning Fang</color> by 3.\nMaximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Bite
constellations.effect: #When casting <color=#FFD780FF>Claw and Thunder</color> ({LAYOUT_MOBILE#Tap}{LAYOUT_PC#Press}{LAYOUT_PS#Press}), opponents hit will have their DEF decreased by 15% for 7s.

constellations.name: Sharpened Claws
constellations.effect: Increases the Level of <color=#FFD780FF>Claw and Thunder</color> by 3.\nMaximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Lupus Fulguris
constellations.effect: Every 10s, Razor's sword charges up, causing the next Normal Attack to release lightning that deals 100% of Razor's ATK as <color=#FFACFFFF>Electro DMG</color>.\nWhen Razor is not using <color=#FFD780FF>Lightning Fang</color>, a lightning strike on an opponent will grant Razor an Electro Sigil for <color=#FFD780FF>Claw and Thunder</color>.

constellations.name: Splitting Gales
constellations.effect: Fires 2 additional arrows per <color=#FFD780FF>Aimed Shot</color>, each dealing 33% of the original arrow's DMG.

constellations.name: Breeze of Reminiscence
constellations.effect: <color=#FFD780FF>Skyward Sonnet</color> decreases opponents' <color=#80FFD7FF>Anemo RES</color> and Physical RES by 12% for 10s.\nOpponents launched by <color=#FFD780FF>Skyward Sonnet</color> suffer an additional 12% <color=#80FFD7FF>Anemo RES</color> and Physical RES decrease while airborne.

constellations.name: Ode to Thousand Winds
constellations.effect: Increases the Level of <color=#FFD780FF>Wind's Grand Ode</color> by 3.\nMaximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Hurricane of Freedom
constellations.effect: When Venti picks up an Elemental Orb or Particle, he receives a 25% <color=#80FFD7FF>Anemo DMG Bonus</color> for 10s.

constellations.name: Concerto dal Cielo
constellations.effect: Increases the Level of <color=#FFD780FF>Skyward Sonnet</color> by 3.\nMaximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Storm of Defiance
constellations.effect: Targets who take DMG from <color=#FFD780FF>Wind's Grand Ode</color> have their <color=#80FFD7FF>Anemo RES</color> decreased by 20%.\nIf an Elemental Absorption occurred, then their RES towards the corresponding Element is also decreased by 20%.

constellations.name: Piercing Fragments
constellations.effect: When a Normal Attack hits, it deals AoE DMG.

constellations.name: Shock Effect
constellations.effect: When <color=#FFD780FF>Jade Screen</color> is shattered, its CD will reset.\nCan occur once every 6s.

constellations.name: Majesty be the Array of Stars
constellations.effect: Increases the Level of <color=#FFD780FF>Starshatter</color> by 3.\nMaximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Exquisite be the Jade, Outshining All Beneath
constellations.effect: <color=#FFD780FF>Jade Screen</color> increases nearby characters' Elemental RES by 10%.

constellations.name: Invincible be the Jade Screen
constellations.effect: Increases the Level of <color=#FFD780FF>Jade Screen</color> by 3.\nMaximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Grandeur be the Seven Stars
constellations.effect: When <color=#FFD780FF>Starshatter</color> is used, Ningguang gains 7 Star Jades.

constellations.name: Gaze of the Deep
constellations.effect: Even when Oz is not present in combat, he can still watch over Fischl through his raven eyes. When Fischl performs a Normal Attack against an opponent, Oz fires a joint attack, dealing DMG equal to 22% of Fischl's ATK.

constellations.name: Devourer of All Sins
constellations.effect: When <color=#FFD780FF>Nightrider</color> is used, it deals an additional 200% ATK as DMG, and its AoE is increased by 50%.

constellations.name: Wings of Nightmare
constellations.effect: Increases the Level of <color=#FFD780FF>Nightrider</color> by 3.\nMaximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Her Pilgrimage of Bleak
constellations.effect: When <color=#FFD780FF>Midnight Phantasmagoria</color> is used, it deals 222% of ATK as <color=#FFACFFFF>Electro DMG</color> to surrounding opponents.\nWhen the skill duration ends, Fischl regenerates 20% of her HP.

constellations.name: Against the Fleeing Light
constellations.effect: Increases the Level of <color=#FFD780FF>Midnight Phantasmagoria</color> by 3.\nMaximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Evernight Raven
constellations.effect: Extends the duration of Oz's presence on the field by 2s. Additionally, Oz performs joint attacks with your active character when present, dealing 30% of Fischl's ATK as <color=#FFACFFFF>Electro DMG</color>.

constellations.name: Raging Vortex
constellations.effect: <color=#FFD780FF>Palm Vortex</color> pulls in opponents and objects within a 5m radius.

constellations.name: Uprising Whirlwind
constellations.effect: Increases Energy Recharge by 16%.

constellations.name: Sweeping Gust
constellations.effect: Increases the Level of <color=#FFD780FF>Gust Surge</color> by 3.\nMaximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Cherishing Breezes
constellations.effect: Reduces DMG taken while casting <color=#FFD780FF>Palm Vortex</color> by 10%.

constellations.name: Vortex Stellaris
constellations.effect: Increases the Level of <color=#FFD780FF>Palm Vortex</color> by 3.\nMaximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Intertwined Winds
constellations.effect: Targets who take DMG from <color=#FFD780FF>Gust Surge</color> have their <color=#80FFD7FF>Anemo RES</color> decreased by 20%.\nIf an Elemental Absorption occurred, then their RES towards the corresponding Element is also decreased by 20%.
